com.maraudersapp.android.mapdrawing

Class PollingManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.maraudersapp.android.mapdrawing.PollingManager

  • public class PollingManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages all the friends, groups, and users poller and chooses when to poll for locations Created by Michael on 10/28/2015.
